summary: The government’s security clearance process helps ensure that federal employees who can access classified information are trustworthy. It has been on our High Risk List since 2018. The Office of the Director of National Intelligence oversees the security clearance process and needs quality data to do so. But we found that the Office doesn't have accurate and complete data about different parts of the clearance...
title: Personnel Security Clearances: Actions Needed to Address Significant Data Reliability Issues That Impact Oversight
